required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Use of Medicinal Plants and Other Alternative and Complementary Medicines by Patients With Cancer in Reunion Island
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of the Use of Medicinal Plants and Other Alternative and Complementary Medicines by Patients With Cancer in Reunion Island

lead_sponsor.agency: Centre Hospitalier Universitaire de la Réunion

clinical_study.source: Centre Hospitalier Universitaire de la Réunion

brief_summary.textblock:
Exploratory, observational and cross-sectional study with the aim of describing the use of plants for medicinal purposes (and other Complementary and Alternative Medicine) and identifying the determinants of this use. The methodology envisaged is mixed with an exploratory design combining qualitative (interviews) and quantitative techniques (questionnaires).
To knowledge of investigators, no study has been carried out in Reunion Island on the use of plants and other alternative and complementary medicines among cancer patients.

primary_outcome.description: Proportion of patients using herbal medicine (from the patient's perspective) among cancer patients.

secondary_outcome.measure: Barriers of dialogue between patient and practionner
secondary_outcome.description: Interviews between patient and interviewer will help to extract the barriers limiting patient/practitioner dialogue on Complementary and Alternative Medicine use from patient and practitioner perspectives

secondary_outcome.measure: Need for Information on Complementary and Alternative Medicine
secondary_outcome.description: Interviews between patient and interviewer will help to find out expectations about the need for information on Complementary and Alternative Medicine use from the patient's perspective and from the practitioner's perspective

secondary_outcome.measure: Improving questionnaire after the practionners' focus group
secondary_outcome.description: A practionners' focus group will be organised after the interviews to review the feedbacks and opinions on the questionnaire to improve the questionnaire for the quantitative part of the study

arm_group.description: Interview about the use of Complementary and Alternative Medecine
Questionnaire about the use of Complementary and Alternative Medecine

study_pop.textblock: Patients with cancer linving in the Reunion Island

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Living in Reunion Island
- Suffering from cancer (solid tumors, hematological malignancies)
- Able to answer a questionnaire
- Patient who does not oppose to the research
Exclusion Criteria:
- Person of legal age under guardianship or under legal protection
- Persons who do not understand French or Reunionese Creole
